```{python id=gGjWM65s8gjn, colab_type=code, outputId=bfb94e49-19c0-4370-d88a-d1475b5ce59f, colab={'base_uri': 'https://localhost:8080/', 'height': 173}}
# %%time
from flair.data import Sentence
from flair.models import SequenceTagger
import PyPDF2 , re
pdfFileObj = open('format.pdf', 'rb')
pdfReader = PyPDF2.PdfFileReader(pdfFileObj)
text=''
for i in range (5,58):
    pageObj = pdfReader.getPage(i)
    text+=(pageObj.extractText())
sentence = Sentence(text)

    # load the NER tagger
tagger = SequenceTagger.load('ner')

#run NER over sentence
tagger.predict(sentence)


```

```{python id=NVigwKl9Ij4J, colab_type=code, outputId=9384cf35-2d9d-498b-e6d7-8dcf97788d82, colab={'base_uri': 'https://localhost:8080/', 'height': 359}}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

csv_new = pd.Series([])
csv_new2 = pd.Series([])
data = pd.read_csv("ff.csv") 
i = 0
for entity in sentence.get_spans('ner'):
  er=str(entity).split(" ")
  entitytype=str(er[0]).replace("-span","")
  entityname=str(er[2]).replace('"',"")
  csv_new[i] = entitytype
  csv_new2[i] = entityname
  
  
  i = i+1
  
data.insert(0, "Entity Type", csv_new) 
data.insert(1, "Entity Name", csv_new2)



data.head(10)
  
  
```
